name: Number of Grassmannian permutations on [n] of order dividing 3.
link: Kassie Archer and Aaron Geary, Descents in powers of permutations, arXiv:2406.09369 [math.CO], 2024.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-1,2,-4,2,-1,2,-1).
example: For n = 4 there are 5 Grassmannian permutations whose cubes are the identity permutation: 1234, 3124, 1423, 2314, 1342, so a(4) = 5.
xref: Cf. A000325 (Grassmannian permutations), A001470 (permutations of order dividing 3).
author: _Aaron Geary_, Apr 05 2025
